HeroSection.tagline: Uncover Hidden Connections. Accelerate Your Investigations.
HeroSection.description: SYNAPSE is a high-performance analytics workbench that transforms complex datasets into interactive network graphs, helping you discover critical relationships faster and more accurately.

FeatureList.title: Powerful Features at Your Fingertips
FeatureList.feature1_description: Explore your data as a dynamic graph. Pan, zoom, and inspect nodes and edges to understand complex networks intuitively.
FeatureList.feature2_description: Instantly find the shortest path between any two entities in your dataset, revealing indirect and often overlooked connections.
FeatureList.feature3_description: Isolate the data that matters. Filter your graph by time ranges, connection types, and node properties to focus your analysis.

NewsletterSection.title: Stay Ahead with SYNAPSE Updates
NewsletterSection.description: Subscribe to our newsletter for the latest feature releases, tips, and case studies.

AboutPageContent.title: About SYNAPSE
AboutPageContent.subtitle: Uncovering connections, empowering investigations.
AboutPageContent.section1_content: Our mission is to provide investigators and analysts with a powerful, intuitive platform to centralize diverse datasets. By transforming fragmented information into a clear, interactive graph, SYNAPSE helps teams uncover critical relationships faster and more accurately than ever before.
AboutPageContent.section2_content: SYNAPSE is built on a modern, high-performance technology stack. The backend leverages the power of Neo4j for graph data storage and FastAPI for a secure, high-speed API. The frontend is a responsive and dynamic single-page application built with Next.js, React, and TypeScript, styled with Tailwind CSS for a clean and adaptable user interface.

HelpPageContent.title: Help Center
HelpPageContent.subtitle: Have questions? We're here to help.

FAQ.q1: What types of data can I import?
FAQ.a1: SYNAPSE currently supports structured data in CSV and JSON formats. The data should represent entities (like people or organizations) and the interactions between them (like calls, messages, or transactions).
FAQ.a2: Absolutely. Security is our top priority. All data transmission is encrypted via HTTPS, and our backend enforces strict role-based access control (RBAC) to ensure that only authorized users can access sensitive information.
FAQ.q3: How does the pathfinding analysis work?
FAQ.a3: The pathfinding feature uses powerful algorithms to find the shortest path between any two selected nodes in the graph. This is useful for discovering indirect connections that are not immediately obvious.
FAQ.a4: Yes. You can switch between light and dark themes from your user dashboard. The application can also be set to follow your system's theme preference automatically.
